dcterms:description: A publicly available dataset that contains 581012 observations, each observation is a vector of 54 features containing both cartographic and soil information, corresponding to a 30 Ã— 30m area of forest. The learning task is to use this information to predict the main kind of tree covering the area, which contains 7 classes. The dataset was balanced by performing a sub-sampling of the classes.
dcterms:title: CovType Dataset
